data.title: Qlik Connect 2024
data.meta_description: Differentia Consulting will be at Qlik's Global Conference, Qlik Connect 2024 to showcase Pixel-perfect-paginated reporting with ancoreShare
data.text:
Differentia Consulting at Qlik Connect 2024

Prepare to meet Differentia Consulting in Orlando, Florida at Qlik Connect 2024, Qlik’s global user conference, from June 3-5, 2024 at the Rosen Shingle Creek in Orlando, Florida.

Qlik Connect (formerly known as QlikWorld, and Qonnections) is the only global event where Qlik’s customers, partners, and product experts gather to learn, share ideas, and explore all things data, analytics, and AI. Differentia Consulting is proud to exhibit at this event with its partner ancoreSoft.

What to expect at Qlik Connect 2024

As organisations look to leverage AI for their competitive advantage. Qlik Connect will help its customers and partners learn how to bring their AI strategy to life through Qlik products and developments, which enable organisations to build a trusted data foundation for AI, leverage modern AI-enhanced analytics, and deploy AI for advanced use cases. Differentia Consulting offers AI enabled Smarter.BI solutions in line with Qlik’s messaging.

The event will include diverse and active opportunities to learn about all things data, analytics, and AI:

CEO Mike Capone and guest speakers will deliver daily keynotes (watch out for these on social media)

Qlik and Talend’s product roadmap and vision, showcasing from key customers

Exploring how Qlik Staige™ is helping organisations realise the full potential of AI

Breakout sessions on innovations and real-world customer deployments

Hands-on workshops, training sessions, and exclusive product certifications

A vendor showcase highlighting solutions at work and endless networking opportunities

(come visit us at our stand #801)

The Qlik product roadmaps offered at these conferences have always been invaluable, and will prove to be pivotal to your long-term data and AI strategy. The conference will also feature presentations from an impressive roster of Qlik speakers, as well as a range of industry experts.

At Differentia Consulting we expect to see visionary content and elucidation concerning Qlik’s future deployment of AI solutions. Furthermore, if you come to our stand you will learn about enhanced reporting for Qlik. This will include demonstrations ranging from simple reporting solutions to the more complex and finely tuned. Pixel-perfect-paginated reporting is a showstopper for the migration of many Qlik on-premise customers to Qlik Cloud. This is a task that ancoreShare can deliver with aplomb.

Use the conference app to connect with our team and to book your demonstration. We look forward to seeing you there.

Registration for Qlik Connect 2024 is now open.

Can’t make it to Qlik Connect? Register for the online livestream.

We are excited to see you there, and there are three essential things that you should discuss with us:

Talk to us about ancoreShare

Differentia Consulting will be exhibiting with our partner, ancoreSoft.

Qlik Data Captains can rethink reporting with ancoreSoft’s ancoreShare extension, a native Qlik add-on that enables you to compose & generate detailed reports and instantly share your data insights with your colleagues – without leaving your dashboard.

The ancoreShare extension is a powerful reporting tool that highlights helpful insights & prepares them for distribution. It becomes even more powerful when combined with ancoreScript.

The ancoreShare extension provides easily-accessible design creation which saves time, and static observations on your terms help to showcase your aims. Improved export options include: PDF, PowerPoint, Excel and CSV, so that no insight is left abandoned.

Active Intelligence

Come and speak to us to learn about Active Intelligence, or as Differentia Consulting has always titled the subject, Hyper Automation. 2024 is your opportunity to ensure everyone in your organisation can access the data they need, when and wherever they need it.

Together we can stop this concept from being a data pipedream, and instead make it your new business reality.

Harmony and Symphony for Qlik

Harmony for Qlik is an application based solution on the Cyferd Platform

that provides the Manage functionality (orchestration) to customers of Qlik, who need to apply greater control or governance over their Qlik estates, typically by the business, i.e. as Self Service

Create (Compose) capability, for example, to centrally manage reloads across the entire estate. DevOps lifecycle management; Qlik OEM, move hydrated apps between tenants, and more.

We look forward to seeing you next month in the USA.

Qlik Connect Livestream

Can’t make it to Orlando? No problem, register here for the Qlik Connect livestream.

Livestream agenda

Tuesday, 4th of June

Qlik’s Vision

Mike Capone, Qlik CEO, will deliver an overview of Qlik’s vision, strategic direction, and outlook. Mike will be joined by IDC’s Meredith Whalen and AI author and advisor Nina Schick.

Innovation and Product Roadmap

Executives from Qlik’s Data and Analytics Business Units will showcase new product innovations and outline what’s coming…

Lightning Round

Mike Capone will lead an energy-filled discussion with global brands on how they addressed business challenges with Qlik.

Wednesday, 5th of June

The Big AI Conversation

Qlik’s AI Council and Chief Strategy Officer James Fisher will explore best-practice applications of AI, along with pressing topics such as ethical integrity and practical applicability.

Ecosystem Innovation

Executives from Qlik, AWS, and Accenture will discuss how customers can gain expertise, knowledge, and support for their data journeys through the combined power of the Qlik ecosystem.

Data Taking Flight

Former James Webb Space Telescope Director Greg Robinson will discuss the power of data to discover the unexpected, including how AI technology is helping to analyse unprecedented insights from Webb.

Book your place for Qlik Connect 2024

Save the date for Qlik Connect 2024, June 3-5, 2024 in Orlando, Florida.

Now is also the opportune time to book your flights…
